location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Genealogical Table showing the members of the ruling Sherifial Family of Mecca from Mohammed Ibn 'Abd el-Mu'in Ibn 'Aun, Emir 1827-1851 and 1856-1858 through to Husein Ibn 'Ali el-'Aun, who succeeded to the Emirate in 1908, and had assumed the title of King 29 October 1916.The table gives birth and death dates (where known) for the family members, the dates individual members held the title of Emir, and other relevant information regarding them including where those who had previously been Emir and were still alive were now living. The table was provided to support the information given in the section on the Ruling Family in the Personalities chapter.
